mapper.insert: insert into user(username, password, email, createDate) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where username = #{username}
mapper.update: update user set profile=#{profile}, introduction=#{introduction}, email=#{email}, height=#{height}, gender=#{gender}, age=#{age}, insta=#{insta}, site=#{site} where id=#{id}

mapper.update: update user set password=#{password} where username=#{username}
